name: places/ChIJrfk7YFFYwokROBAbtMbSoX8
formattedAddress: 430 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 430 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Custom cut glass shop for mirrors, Plexiglas, picture frames & shower door or window installation.

originalText.text:
I had a truly exceptional experience with them. Their prompt email responses made the entire process smooth and efficient. I wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone in need. I required a sizable plexiglass sheet to be custom-cut for my coffee table, and they delivered it within a mere 24 hours. Their professionalism and attention to detail were impressive, ensuring everything was completed with utmost timeliness.
If you’re looking for any type of glass or plexiglass to be cut, look no further!!

text.text:

originalText.text: I have worked with Clinton glass as a project manager for over three years and they continue to provide my teams and my clients at the highest level, professionalism and service. They are able to use their expertise in the templating process to clients more comfortable in choosing the type of work they would like to be done. And once the process begins, they are very expeditious in getting the product finalized and ready for installation. and the installation process is seamless. The quality of work comes out immaculate and if there’s ever any issues down the line and more than happy to work with a customer or team working on site to solve them. Clinton Glass goes Above and Beyond to be the best I’ve ever worked with.

originalText.text:
I've been a GM in NYC for over 20 years and from the beginning,  I was fortunate enough to find Clinton Glass for all my home renovations.
They are always professional and their craftmanship is impeccable. Bill Sr and Bill Jr are always available, and they will go to great lengths to be sure the client is 100% happy and satisfied.
Thank you, Clinton Glass for all the years of reliable work and help.

Sincerely,
Artist's Renovations and Woodworking LLC

originalText.text: Fair pricing and good quality. This is the type of glass shop that you could find in every Ny neighborhood several decades back now it’s a rarity. Definitely worth supporting this place and they are often more competitive than many other glass shops.

text.text: Fair pricing and good quality. This is the type of glass shop that you could find in every Ny neighborhood several decades back now it’s a rarity. Definitely worth supporting this place and they are often more competitive than many other glass shops.

originalText.text: Clinton Glass and Mirrors provided great service as well as a great product to replace a broken dresser mirror drawer three times that I had broken. They executed the replacement perfectly with quick turnaround and my dresser looks brand new. Service and professionalism were all five star.
